meanings.sent1: There were countless stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in countless seashells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: I have countless socks, but I can never find a matching pair!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness knew no bounds, reaching out to countless people in need.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with countless trees, each one standing tall and proud.

meanings.definition: Very many; countless stars in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The library had countless books on various topics.
meanings.sent2: The baker made countless delicious pastries for the town's people.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled countless rabbits out of his hat, much to the audience's delight.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like countless petals falling gently from a cherry blossom tree.
meanings.sent5: The artist's studio was filled with countless colorful paints waiting to be used on the canvas.
